DOC.brief_title: Creatine Supplementation Patients With Intermittent Claudication .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study verify effect creatine supplementation associate clinical treatment functional capacity patient intermittent claudication . The sample compose patient intermittent claudication sex . The patient ramdomized double-blind procedure receive seven day ( load ) posteriorly 49 day ( maintenance ) creatine ( Cr ) supplementation placebo ( PLA ) , associated clinical treatment . Before ( `` baseline '' ) , `` loading '' period maintenance period supplementation , patient go functional capacity evaluation . The fuctional capacity evaluation evaluate six minute-walking test . For statistical analysis use ANOVA two factor repeat measurement , ( Cr PLA ) group time ( pre , post-loading post-maintenance ) , need post-hoc Newman keuls . The adopted level significance P < 0.05 .
